rootCause: helm-oci-install forwarded CLI inputs like chart=oci://... directly, so _helm-oci-deploy built helm commands using values prefixed with the argument names, producing chart=chart=oci://... and triggering invalid chart URL errors.
resolution: Normalize helm-oci parameters to strip any leading name= prefixes before building helm arguments so that chart values are passed exactly once while keeping the documented just interface, and verify the generated command with just -n.
references: just helm-oci-install release=dspace namespace=dspace chart=oci://ghcr.io/democratizedspace/charts/dspace values=docs/examples/dspace.values.dev.yaml,docs/examples/dspace.values.staging.yaml version_file=docs/apps/dspace.version default_tag=v3-latest
